name: Recollection
description:
All the same, all the time. Day in, day out. But maybe there is more, if you just look close enough ... and remember.

Recollect your surroundings

Bring the forgotten wonders of this beautiful world back to your attention.

Varied gameplay

Rediscover fascinating things like the stars, flowers and trees in playful experiences.

Two game modes

Face the many threats these wonders are facing in the optional second "fragile mode".

Accessibility

Adjust the game to your likings through many settings, i.e. change the difficulty seamlessly at any time without getting punished for it.

Features

  • Many wonderful things to discover in hand-crafted, diverse experiences
  • Casual, accessible gameplay
  • Two game modes: Natural (relaxed & wholesome) / Fragile (challenging & concerning)
  • Atmospheric silhouette artstyle
  • Emotional, magical soundtrack
  • Short playtime of about 1-2 hours
  • Playable with mouse & keyboard, controller or just using the mouse
